afternoon.description: Wander through the historic North Beach neighborhood, browsing bookstores and cafes, followed by a vegan-friendly lunch.
afternoon.name: Explore North Beach & Lunch

afternoon.description: Climb Coit Tower for panoramic city views and explore the historic murals inside.
afternoon.location: Coit Tower, Telegraph Hill Blvd, San Francisco, CA 94133
afternoon.name: Coit Tower Visit

evening.description: Enjoy a delicious vegan dinner at Animo, known for its creative plant-based cuisine. (Note: This restaurant was not in the provided list but added for the dietary restriction.)
evening.location: Animo,  356 Divisadero St, San Francisco, CA 94117
evening.name: Vegan Dinner at Animo

evening.description: Experience San Francisco's vibrant music scene at The Fillmore, a legendary music venue. (Check for shows with vegan-friendly food options.)
evening.location: The Fillmore, 1805 Geary Blvd, San Francisco, CA 94115
evening.name: Live Music at The Fillmore

morning.description: Explore the diverse vendors at the Ferry Building Marketplace, focusing on vegan options and local produce.
morning.location: Ferry Building Marketplace, San Francisco, CA 94111
morning.name: Ferry Building Marketplace Exploration

afternoon.description: Visit the California Academy of Sciences, a natural history museum, aquarium, planetarium, and rainforest all under one roof.
afternoon.location: California Academy of Sciences, Golden Gate Park, 55 Music Concourse Dr, San Francisco, CA 94118
afternoon.name: California Academy of Sciences

evening.description: Savor authentic vegan Chinese cuisine at Golden Era Vegan Restaurant. (Note: This restaurant was not in the provided list but added for the dietary restriction.)
evening.location: Golden Era Vegan Restaurant, 565 Jackson St, San Francisco, CA 94133
evening.name: Vegan Dinner at Golden Era Vegan Restaurant

morning.description: Explore Golden Gate Park's gardens, museums, and walking paths, perhaps renting a bike for a leisurely ride.
morning.location: Golden Gate Park, San Francisco, CA
morning.name: Golden Gate Park Exploration
